reviewText:
All these 50s era health school films are amusing because they are so dated. You would never watch them in order to learn anything. Instead they work at showing you how repressed and stupid adults were back in the IKE era.

This time around being lazy and spreading gossip are the sins that will cause you to be broke, pregnant and living on the streets.

No mention is made of drugs or sex or war or unemployment or anything real.

I guess they really believed that as long as you got up early and didn't talk about people you'd be rich.

I just like laughing at these clips.
